item.description:
We'll be preparing the site for a new nursery of native trees and shrubs. Everyone who helps out gets a tree of their own. We'll also spend time observing local suburban wildlife. And, as always, refreshments will be provided---both nourishing and delicious (yum!).

You need not work for long; you might just choose to stop by, take a peak, and chat. If you'd like to help, bring garden gloves and a pointed shovel (if you've got one--otherwise, there should still be spares).

We'll be working from 10am until 4 or 5pm this Saturday/Sunday and the next few weekends through March.
item.name: Volunteer Opportunity: Urban Lot Beautification
